== Siridao (626724) ==

Siridao is a village in the [[Tiswadi]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 669.66 hectares and harbouring 578 households with total population of 2417 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 1179 and female population is 1238. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1265. Census Location Code of the village is 626724<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
